mapper.sql: id as id , major_type as majorType , discipline_code as disciplineCode , discipline_name as disciplineName , discipline_sub_code as disciplineSubCode , discipline_sub_name as disciplineSubName , major_code as majorCode , major_name as majorName , major_note as majorNote , salary_rank as salaryRank , employmentRate as employmentRate
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_major_base ( major_type, discipline_code, discipline_name, discipline_sub_code, discipline_sub_name, major_code, major_name, major_note, salary_rank, employmentRate ) VALUES ( #{majorType}, #{disciplineCode}, #{disciplineName}, #{disciplineSubCode}, #{disciplineSubName}, #{majorCode}, #{majorName}, #{majorNote}, #{salaryRank}, #{employmentRate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_major_base
major_type = #{majorType},
discipline_code = #{disciplineCode},
discipline_name = #{disciplineName},
discipline_sub_code = #{disciplineSubCode},
discipline_sub_name = #{disciplineSubName},
major_code = #{majorCode},
major_name = #{majorName},
major_note = #{majorNote},
salary_rank = #{salaryRank},
employmentRate = #{employmentRate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_major_base
major_type = #{map.majorType},
discipline_code = #{map.disciplineCode},
discipline_name = #{map.disciplineName},
discipline_sub_code = #{map.disciplineSubCode},
discipline_sub_name = #{map.disciplineSubName},
major_code = #{map.majorCode},
major_name = #{map.majorName},
major_note = #{map.majorNote},
salary_rank = #{map.salaryRank},
employmentRate = #{map.employmentRate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_major_base ( major_type, discipline_code, discipline_name, discipline_sub_code, discipline_sub_name, major_code, major_name, major_note, salary_rank, employmentRate ) VALUES ( #{map.majorType}, #{map.disciplineCode}, #{map.disciplineName}, #{map.disciplineSubCode}, #{map.disciplineSubName}, #{map.majorCode}, #{map.majorName}, #{map.majorNote}, #{map.salaryRank}, #{map.employmentRate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, major_type
, discipline_code
, discipline_name
, discipline_sub_code
, discipline_sub_name
, major_code
, major_name
, major_note
, salary_rank
, employmentRate
FROM zgk_major_base
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND major_type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorType} , '%')
AND discipline_code like CONCAT('%', #{condition.disciplineCode} , '%')
AND discipline_name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.disciplineName} , '%')
AND discipline_sub_code like CONCAT('%', #{condition.disciplineSubCode} , '%')
AND discipline_sub_name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.disciplineSubName} , '%')
AND major_code like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorCode} , '%')
AND major_name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorName} , '%')
AND major_note like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorNote} , '%')
AND salary_rank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.salaryRank} , '%')
AND employmentRate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.employmentRate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
